questions.text: Do you prefer socializing with a group of friends or spending time alone?
Do you feel energized by being around people or drained by social interactions?
Do you enjoy being the center of attention or prefer to stay in the background?
Do you prefer to express your thoughts and feelings out loud or keep them to yourself?
Do you prefer to plan activities with others or do things on your own?
Do you prefer to focus on facts and details or see the big picture?
Do you prefer to follow established procedures or come up with new ideas?
Do you prefer to deal with concrete information or abstract concepts?
Do you prefer to focus on the present or think about the future?
Do you prefer to work with established methods or experiment with new approaches?
Do you prefer to make decisions based on logic and objective analysis or on personal values and emotions?
Do you prefer to be objective and impartial or empathetic and understanding?
Do you prefer to make decisions based on facts and data or on people's feelings and needs?
Do you prefer to be analytical and critical or supportive and harmonious?
Do you prefer to be logical and systematic or flexible and adaptable?
Do you prefer to plan and organize your life or be spontaneous and flexible?
Do you prefer to have a clear structure and schedule or be open to new possibilities?
Do you prefer to make decisions quickly and stick to them or take your time and consider all options?
Do you prefer to have a clear set of rules and expectations or be open to change and adaptation?
Do you prefer to be decisive and take charge or be more laid-back and go with the flow?
